item.title: SafeZone - mobile secuirty app
item.description: The free SafeZone App lets you summon help from the campus security team whenever you need it. Team members will instantly know who you are, where you are and what you need. Find out more at SafeZoneApp.com
item.content: SAFEZONE is revolutionising the way safety and security is managed on open campuses. It's a powerful, easy to use command and control system that extends the Security Team's view of any situation and allows everyone to communicate and coordinate in response to any incident.
item.dc:creator: Admin
